Birdshit Island.

Ren your videos are just the best mood-improver!  I feel happier as soon as the theme music kicks in lol.  Bam!  I’m loving the content / narrative you and doc are spinning this season.  You both put in an immersive effort and the video production is top notch. Huge thanks and admiration.
The white concrete actually reminds me not of snow but of ash. Like a forrest after a devastating wildfire.

On the terraforming project, I’m just going to say, as an Australian who has spent time around The Great Barrier Reef and Geographer. There are well known islands around the reef (such as Whitehaven Beach) that have pristine white sand so I think the white concrete powder was a good choice. 

Also, on Whitehaven the sand makes a strange noise as you walk across it. The Indigenous people in the area call it whispering sands. Although, I’ e heard some locals refer to it as ‘barking spiders’. Pretty fitting considering you have a scary 8 legged creature standing on your island.
